segments.text: I'm observing a domestic scene, filled with subtle tensions.

segments.text: Above the sink, a wide window draws my attention.

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on both sides, revealing the outside world.

segments.text: The window panes are divided into small squares, a charming detail.

segments.text: Through the open window, a lovely garden is visible.

segments.text: I see a path or walkway with low bushes and plants on both sides.

segments.text: A fence or structure stands further back in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside appears so calm and meticulously tidy.

segments.text: It's a stark contrast to the unfolding chaos inside this kitchen.

segments.text: I feel a sense of happiness just looking at the peaceful garden.
